data.text:
Porto Cervo

Porto Cervo is a city in Sardinia, in Italy.

GPS Coordinates of Porto Cervo, Sardinia, Italy

Porto Cervo is located on the latitude of 41.14063 and longitude of 9.53267 and has a geohash of spqf0cmmx33c.

Cities and Towns near Porto Cervo

The nearest significant population center from Porto Cervo is Palau in Sardinia, Italy, located 13 kilometers or 8 miles ← W of the city. Other locations in close proximity include Arzachena (Sardinia, Italy) located 13 km (8 mi) ↙ SW and Golfo Aranci (Sardinia, Italy) located 19 km (12 mi) ↘ SE of Porto Cervo.

In total, we found 50 cities near Porto Cervo in our database.

Power Plants near Porto Cervo

We found a total of 23 utility scale power plants in close proximity of Porto Cervo.
